info.name: E-commerce User Management APIs
info.description: Collection for testing Authentication and User Management APIs

request.description: Register a new admin user account.
Login with username and password. Returns JWT token.
Login as admin user. Default admin credentials: admin/admin123
Update current user profile (address, phone, email)
